title: The Gospel of Loki by Joanne M. Harris. EPUB (Perseu)
description:
The novel is a brilliant first-person narrative of
the rise and fall of the Norse gods - retold from
the point of view of the world's ultimate trickster,
Loki. It tells the story of Loki's recruitment from
the underworld of Chaos, his many exploits on behalf
of his one-eyed master, Odin, through to his eventual
betrayal of the gods and the fall of Asgard itself.
Using her life-long passion for the Norse myths,
Joanne Harris has created a vibrant and powerful
fantasy novel.

The Gospel of Loki
By: Joanne Harris
ISBN: 9781473202351
Format: EPUB
Language: EN
Pages: 507
